attributes.action: Award Bernard Kenny the George Medal for bravery.
attributes.additional_details:
The much loved and widely respected Labour MP Jo Cox was murdered in act of grotesque violence.
Mr Bernard Kenny tried to prevent this heinous act from occurring and proved himself to be a hero.
We believe this deserves recognition and that Mr Kenny should be awarded the George Medal.
attributes.background:
We believe that Bernard Kenny is a hero for intervening and trying to save Jo Cox.
Mr Kenny deserves recognition for his bravery and should be awarded the George Medal.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
